metadata.dc:title: Systems for measuring corporal temperature as an alternative to the mercury-in-glass thermometer
metadata.dc:description: The objective of this article is to compare the different devices which the health market offers as substitutes for the mercury-in-glass thermomete
metadata.dc:creator: Vila Morte, Gina
metadata.dc:title: Sistemas de medición de temperatura corporal alternativas al termómetro cristal/mercurio
